summary_text: In 1947, Jackie Robinson becomes the first African-American to play in Major League Baseball in the modern era when he was signed by the Brooklyn Dodgers and faces considerable racism in the process.

name: The House with a Clock in Its Walls
summary_text: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.

name: Endless Love
summary_text: A high-school student's love for a 15-year-old girl is thwarted by parental disapproval, circumstance, and accident; he burns down her family's house and is committed to a psychiatric hospital.

name: Testament of Youth
summary_text: A British woman recalls coming of age during World War I - a story of young love, the futility of war, and how to make sense of the darkest times.

name: Muhtesem Yüzyil
summary_text: From 1520, follows Suleiman the Magnificent and his relatives from his great conquests to the "Battle of Szigeth".

name: Des
summary_text: In 1983 Scottish serial killer Dennis Nilsen was arrested after the discovery of human remains which had blocked a drain near his London home.

name: Sabrina
summary_text: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

name: The Thundermans
summary_text: These siblings with superpowers might be twins, but they are very different indeed.

name: Walk of Shame
summary_text: A reporter's dream of becoming a news anchor is compromised after a one-night stand leaves her stranded in downtown L.A. without a phone, car, ID or money - and only 8 hours to make it to the most important job interview of her life.

name: Father of the Bride Part 3 (ish)
summary_text: Twenty-five years after the second movie's release, the Banks Family gathered together for a Zoom call and a very special wedding-related announcement.

name: The Age of Innocence
summary_text: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

name: Magic
summary_text: A ventriloquist is at the mercy of his vicious dummy while he tries to renew a romance with his high school sweetheart.

name: The Darkest Minds
summary_text: Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.

name: The Night Clerk
summary_text: A voyeuristic hotel clerk becomes the subject of a murder investigation.

name: Miranda Veil
summary_text: When aspiring serial killer Soren, abducts his first victim Miranda, both of them are shocked to discover that she is unable to die.

name: The Amityville Horror
summary_text: Newlyweds and their three kids move into a large house where a mass murder was committed. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations which have strong effects on everyone living or visiting the house.

name: 13 West Street
summary_text: An aerospace engineer (Ladd) ignores a policeman (Steiger) and hunts down a gang of juvenile delinquents.

name: Akame ga Kill!
summary_text: A countryside boy named Tatsumi sets out on a journey to The Capital to make a name for himself and met a seemingly dangerous group of Assassins known as Night Raid. Their journey begins.

Stellar Year 2148, District 86 has a weird background: everyone who leads it will go crazy. Major Vladilena is forced to be their new headmaster and she is determinate to investigate on this District.

name: V
summary_text: When aliens come to Earth to ask for our help, a few suspicious humans discover their horrific true intentions and prepare to resist.

name: Criminal
summary_text: In a last-ditch effort to stop a diabolical plot, a dead CIA operative's memories, secrets, and skills are implanted into a death-row inmate in hopes that he will complete the operative's mission.

name: The Vast of Night
summary_text: One night in New Mexico, in the late 1950s, a switchboard operator and radio DJ discover a strange audio frequency which could change the future forever.

name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
summary_text: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.

name: Superman III
summary_text: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

name: The Gulf
summary_text: A detective's personal and professional life start to unravel when she is involved in a fatal car accident and begins to lose her memory.

name: Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman
summary_text: In addition to fighting evil, Superman has a burning romance with Lois Lane in both of his identities.

name: Motel Hell
summary_text: A seemingly friendly farmer and his sister kidnap unsuspecting travelers and bury them alive, using them to create the "special meat" they are famous for.

name: Kurulus: Osman
summary_text: The series will focus on the life of Osman Bey, the son of Ertugrul Gazi and the founder of the Ottoman Empire.

name: Dharma & Greg
summary_text: A free-spirited yoga instructor finds true love in a conservative lawyer and they get married on the first date. Though they are polar opposites, he fulfills her need of stability and she fulfills his need of optimism.

name: Secret Invasion
summary_text: Fury and Talos try to stop the Skrulls who have infiltrated the highest spheres of the Marvel Universe.

name: Serpico
summary_text: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

name: For Life
summary_text: A prisoner becomes a lawyer and fights to overturn his life sentence for a crime he didn't commit.

name: Melissa & Joey
summary_text: After a family scandal leaves Mel, a local politician, in charge of her niece and nephew, she hires a man named Joe to become the family's male nanny, or "manny".

name: The Last Temptation of Christ
summary_text: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

name: Against All Odds
summary_text: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

name: Baby Boy
summary_text: In South Central L.A., a misguided 20-year-old African-American man, a "baby boy", faces the commitments of real life.

name: The Ghost Writer
summary_text: A ghost writer, hired to complete the memoirs of a former British Prime Minister, uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

name: Cloak & Dagger
summary_text: Two teenagers from very different backgrounds find themselves burdened and awakened to newly acquired superpowers while growing closer together every day.

name: I Love Lucy
summary_text: The wife of a band leader constantly tries to become a star - in spite of her having no talent, and gets herself (along with her best friend) into the funniest predicaments.

name: Freddy vs. Jason
summary_text: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenagers of Elm Street. Only this time, they're out to get each other, too.
Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.

name: Jaws 2
summary_text: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

name: Pure Country
summary_text: Dusty gets tired of all the smoke and light effects, wonders what happened to doing it the way that made him famous and happy. Takes a walk to find what seems to be missing and finds himself and his music again!

name: The Golden Compass
summary_text: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

name: The King of Comedy
summary_text: Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.

name: About Cherry
summary_text: A troubled young woman moves to San Francisco, where she becomes involved in pornography and aligns herself with a cocaine-addicted lawyer.

name: A Quiet Place Part III
summary_text: Plot under wraps.

name: Blood In, Blood Out
summary_text: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

name: Little Nicky
summary_text: After two of the devil's three sons escape Hell to wreak havoc on Earth, the devil must send his third son, the mild-mannered Nicky, to bring them back before it's too late.

name: Wild Card
summary_text: When a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal skills and a gambling problem gets in trouble with the mob, he has one last play...and it's all or nothing.

name: Marry Me
summary_text: Music superstars Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting married before a global audience of fans. But when Kat learns, seconds before her vows, that Bastian has been unfaithful, she decides to marry Charlie, a stranger in the crowd, instead.

name: Man Down
summary_text: A deadbeat drama teacher gets a wake-up call when his girlfriend leaves him.

name: The Client
summary_text: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

name: Midnight Sun
summary_text: A 17-year-old girl suffers from a condition that prevents her from being out in the sunlight.

name: Ella Enchanted
summary_text: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new stepfamily in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

name: War & Peace
summary_text: As the Russian conflict with Napoleon reaches its peak, five aristocratic families face the possibility of their lives being changed forever.

name: Eight Legged Freaks
summary_text: Venomous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

name: The Best Man
summary_text: Just before his best friend's wedding, the life of a Chicago writer becomes crazy when his best friend guesses that his new book's story is based on his bride's fervent past.

name: The Last House on the Left
summary_text: Two teenage girls heading to a rock concert for one's birthday try to score marijuana in the city, where they are kidnapped and brutalized by a gang of psychotic convicts.

name: Enforcement
summary_text: Jens and Mike, two police officers on routine patrol, find themselves trapped in a maze of buildings when unrest spreads.

name: Citadel
summary_text: Plot kept under wraps. Described as action-packed spy series.

name: A Fistful of Dollars
summary_text: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

name: Four Weddings and a Funeral
summary_text: Television adaptation of the romantic comedy film 'Four Weddings and a Funeral'.

name: Annie Hall
summary_text: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

name: The Postman
summary_text: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

name: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
summary_text: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

name: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
summary_text: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

name: Lord of War
summary_text: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

name: Lars and the Real Girl
summary_text: A delusional young man strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

name: License to Drive
summary_text: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

name: Adventure Time: Distant Lands
summary_text: Adventure Time has a sequel with new adventures around other worlds.

name: Midnight Run
summary_text: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

name: What's Love Got to Do with It
summary_text: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from her abusive husband, Ike Turner.

name: Cabaret
summary_text: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

name: Get Shorty
summary_text: The adventures of a mobster-turned-movie producer in Hollywood. TV show based on Elmore Leonard's novel and subsequent film.

name: Flushed Away
summary_text: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

name: Krypton
summary_text: The untold story of Superman's grandfather as he fights for justice on his home planet.

name: Untitled 'Bosch' Spinoff
summary_text: Bosch embarks on the next chapter of his career and finds himself working with his one-time enemy, Honey Chandler.

name: Ghosts of War
summary_text: Five American soldiers assigned to hold a French Chateau near the end of World War II. This unexpected respite quickly descends into madness when they encounter a supernatural enemy more terrifying than anything seen on the battlefield.

name: 10 Years
summary_text: The night of their high school reunion, a group of friends realize they still haven't quite grown up in some ways.

name: Ben 10
summary_text: The story of Ben Tennyson, a typical kid who becomes very atypical after he discovers the Omnitrix, a mysterious alien device with the power to transform the wearer into ten different alien species.

name: Two Hands
summary_text: A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.

name: Dear John
summary_text: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.

name: Rush Hour 3
summary_text: After an attempted assassination on Ambassador Han, Lee and Carter head to Paris to protect a French woman with knowledge of the Triads' secret leaders.

name: The Fabelmans
summary_text: A semi-autobiography from the director's own childhood.

name: Live and Let Die
summary_text: James Bond is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organisation and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

name: The Nutty Professor
summary_text: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

name: The Tick
summary_text: In a world where superheroes have been real for decades, an accountant with no superpowers comes to realize his city is owned by a super villain. As he struggles to uncover this conspiracy, he falls in league with a strange blue superhero.

name: Green Street Hooligans
summary_text: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

name: The Novice
summary_text: An obsessive novice rower climbs the ranks of her college's rowing team.

name: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
summary_text: An exploration of our discovery of the laws of nature and coordinates in space and time.

name: Pee-wee's Playhouse
summary_text: Pee-Wee Herman and his friends have wacky, imaginative fun in his unique playhouse.

name: Big Time Adolescence
summary_text: A suburban teenager comes of age under the destructive guidance of his best friend, an aimless college dropout.

name: Murder by Numbers
summary_text: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

name: Before We Go
summary_text: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.

name: The Heat
summary_text: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.

name: American Pie 2
summary_text: Jim and his friends are now in college, and they decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.

name: Bob Hearts Abishola
summary_text: An American guy falls in love with his Nigerian nurse.

name: Killers
summary_text: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

name: Perception
summary_text: Dr. Daniel Pierce is an eccentric neuropsychiatrist who uses his unique outlook to help the federal government solve complex criminal cases.

name: The Fourth Kind
summary_text: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

name: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
summary_text: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

name: Breaking News in Yuba County
summary_text: A woman takes advantage of her growing celebrity status when the police and the public think her dead husband is just missing.

name: True Grit
summary_text: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

name: Step Up
summary_text: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.

name: xXx
summary_text: An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.

name: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
summary_text: 'Transformers: Rise of the Beasts' will take audiences on a '90s adventure and introduce the Maximals, Predacons, and Terrorcons to the existing battle on earth between Autobots and Decepticons.

name: Sacrifice
summary_text: After his mother's death, Isaac and his pregnant wife return to his birthplace on a remote Norwegian island to claim on unexpected inheritance. During their visit, the couple discover dark ...                See full summary »

name: The Crazies
summary_text: After a strange and insecure plane crash, an unusual toxic virus enters a quaint farming town. A young couple are quarantined, but they fight for survival along with help from a couple of people.

name: The Black Dahlia
summary_text: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" Elizabeth Short murder investigation.

name: Vertical Limit
summary_text: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

name: Treadstone
summary_text: The Treadstone project, having created super spy Jason Bourne, turns its attention on a new protocol to develop unstoppable superhuman assassins.

name: The Parent Trap
summary_text: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

name: King Kong
summary_text: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.

name: Pacific Rim: Uprising
summary_text: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

name: Menace II Society
summary_text: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

name: Guardian: The Lonely and Great God
summary_text: In his quest for a bride to break his immortal curse, Dokkaebi, a 939-year-old guardian of souls, meets a grim reaper and a sprightly student with a tragic past.

name: The Good Shepherd
summary_text: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

name: Cheyenne
summary_text: After the Civil War, nomadic adventurer Cheyenne Bodie roamed the west looking for fights, women, and bad guys to beat up. His job changed from episode to episode.

name: Tommy Boy
summary_text: After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.

name: The Woman
summary_text: When a successful country lawyer captures and attempts to "civilize" the last remaining member of a violent clan that has roamed the Northeast coast for decades, he puts the lives of his family in jeopardy.

name: Larry Crowne
summary_text: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

name: The Hustle
summary_text: Two con women - one low rent and the other high class - team up to take down the men who have wronged them.

name: The Thomas Crown Affair
summary_text: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

name: Mass Effect
summary_text: In a technologically advanced future, an elite human soldier takes command of a prototype star ship and works to defend the galaxy from danger.

name: Masters of the Air
summary_text: Five miles above the earth and deep behind enemy lines, eleven men inside a bomber known as the "Flying Fortress" fight for their lives against swarms of enemy German fighters. As American ...                See full summary »

name: Circle
summary_text: Held captive and faced with their imminent executions, fifty strangers are forced to choose the one person among them who deserves to live.

name: Kala
summary_text: A psychological thriller that revolves around Shaji who faces an intriguing conflict with the many layered shades of human behavior.

name: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
summary_text: The Madagascar animals join a struggling European circus to get back to New York, but find themselves being pursued by a psychotic animal control officer.

name: The Wolfman
summary_text: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten, and subsequently cursed by, a werewolf.

name: Open Season
summary_text: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear, finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

name: Beforeigners
summary_text: HBO Nordic's first original series from Norway, Beforeigners is about two persons who mysteriously appear in Oslo. They are the first of many from the past to seek refuge in present time. Seven years later the community is transformed.

name: Christmas Vacation
summary_text: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

name: Lions for Lambs
summary_text: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

name: Grindhouse
summary_text: Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez's homage to exploitation double features in the '60s and '70s with two back-to-back cult films that include previews of coming attractions between them.

name: Maniac
summary_text: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.

name: Tales of the City
summary_text: A middle-aged Mary Ann returns to San Francisco and reunites with the eccentric friends she left behind. "Tales of the City" focuses primarily on the people who live in a boardinghouse turned apartment complex owned by Anna Madrigal at 28 Barbary Lane, all of whom quickly become part of what Maupin coined a "logical family". It's no longer a secret that Mrs. Madrigal is transgender. Instead, she ...                See full summary »

name: Return to Oz
summary_text: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

name: 2 Guns
summary_text: Two hardened criminals get into trouble with the US border patrol after meeting with a Mexican drug lord, and then revelations start to unfold.

name: Minions: The Rise of Gru
summary_text: The untold story of one twelve-year-old's dream to become the world's greatest supervillain.

name: Made in Italy
summary_text: A bohemian artist travels from London to Italy with his estranged son to sell the house he inherited from his late wife.

name: Rurouni Kenshin Part II: Kyoto Inferno
summary_text: Kenshin Himura goes up against pure evil Makoto Shishio who is attempting to overthrow the Meiji government. The fate of the country hangs in the balance as Kenshin Himura takes up the sword that he vowed to never draw again.

name: Kung Fury 2
summary_text: The story will focus on Kung Fury's universe with no real connection to the short movie other than the lead character.

name: Sister Act
summary_text: When a nightclub singer is forced to take refuge from the mob in a convent, she ends up turning the convent choir into a soulful chorus complete with a Motown repertoire, until the sudden celebrity of the choir jeopardizes her identity.

name: A Walk Among the Tombstones
summary_text: Private investigator Matthew Scudder is hired by a drug kingpin to find out who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

name: Belgravia
summary_text: Follows events when the emerging nouveau riche, including the Trenchard family, rub shoulders with London's established upper classes and when secrets from the past threaten to emerge.

name: Invasion
summary_text: With the fall of the alien ship Julia's life changed, now three years later mankind is about to experience new encounter.

name: The Wolf of Snow Hollow
summary_text: Terror grips a small mountain town as bodies are discovered after each full moon. Losing sleep, raising a teenage daughter, and caring for his ailing father, officer Marshall struggles to remind himself there's no such thing as werewolves.

name: Black Spot
summary_text: A police chief and an eccentric new prosecutor investigate a string of grisly crimes and eerie phenomena in an isolated town at the edge of a forest.

name: Fright Night
summary_text: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

name: Silence: Can You Hear It
summary_text: When everyone is hiding the truth, justice will thrive despite the silence. Prepare for a murder mystery that will keep you guessing till the end.

name: The Beguiled
summary_text: The unexpected arrival of a wounded Union soldier at a girls school in Virginia during the American Civil War leads to jealousy and betrayal.

name: Patriot Games
summary_text: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

name: Sweet Girl
summary_text: A devastated husband vows to bring justice to the people responsible for his wife's death while protecting the only family he has left, his daughter.

name: Murder on the Orient Express
summary_text: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

name: Stranger Than Fiction
summary_text: I.R.S. auditor Harold Crick suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

name: The Secrets We Keep
summary_text: In post-WWII America, a woman, rebuilding her life in the suburbs with her husband, kidnaps her neighbor and seeks vengeance for the heinous war crimes she believes he committed against her.

name: Four Rooms
summary_text: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.

name: Catch and Release
summary_text: A woman struggles to accept the death of her fiancé and the secrets he kept from her as she rebuilds her life.

name: Rookie of the Year
summary_text: When an accident miraculously gives a boy an incredibly powerful pitching arm, he becomes a major league pitcher for the Chicago Cubs.

name: Roma
summary_text: A year in the life of a middle-class family's maid in Mexico City in the early 1970s.

name: Horrible Bosses 2
summary_text: Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.

name: Pandorum
summary_text: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone.

name: Sophie's Choice
summary_text: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

name: America's Got Talent
summary_text: A weekly talent competition where an array of performers -- from singers and dancers, to comedians and novelty acts -- vie for a $1 million cash prize.

name: Trouble with the Curve
summary_text: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout, by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

name: Blood Red Sky
summary_text: A woman with a mysterious illness is forced into action when a group of terrorists attempt to hijack a transatlantic overnight flight.

name: Salem
summary_text: Supernatural horror loosely based on Salem's 17th century witch trials.

name: La Haine
summary_text: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

name: The Thorn Birds
summary_text: In the arid 1920s Australian Outback, a Catholic priest and the beautiful niece of a vast sheep station owner stand powerless before God's will, tormented by desire. How far are they willing to go in the name of love?

name: I'm Sorry
summary_text: A seemingly-confident comedy writer, wife, and mom comically exposes her inner immaturity and neuroses through unexpected life situations.

name: Waterloo Road
summary_text: A contemporary drama series set in a challenging comprehensive school.

name: Lilyhammer
summary_text: A New York mobster goes into hiding in rural Lillehammer in Norway after testifying against his former associates.

name: Despicable Me 2
summary_text: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

name: Three Men and a Baby
summary_text: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

name: Replicas
summary_text: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.

name: Stargate Universe
summary_text: Trapped on an Ancient spaceship billions of light-years from home, a group of soldiers and civilians struggle to survive and find their way back to Earth.

name: Inspector George Gently
summary_text: With the help of DS John Bacchus, Inspector George Gently spends his days bringing to justice members of the criminal underworld who are unfortunate enough to have the intrepid investigator assigned to their cases.

name: Saw VI
summary_text: Agent Strahm is dead, and FBI agent Erickson draws nearer to Hoffman. Meanwhile, a pair of insurance executives find themselves in another game set by Jigsaw.

name: The Jeffersons
summary_text: A nouveau riche, African-American family who move into a luxury apartment building develop close, if occasionally fractious, relationships with other tenants.

name: Music
summary_text: Zu is newly sober when she receives news that she is to become the sole guardian of her half-sister named Music, a young girl on the autism spectrum. The film explores two of Sia's favorite themes: finding your voice and creating family.

name: Hall Pass
summary_text: Rick and Fred, two husbands who are having difficulty in their marriages, are given a Hall Pass by their wives: for one week, they can do whatever they want.

name: Spring Break
summary_text: Two sets of two college guys spend a spring break together in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. There they have lots of fun in and out of the sun.

name: Maid in Manhattan
summary_text: A Senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite, when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

name: Fracture
summary_text: An attorney intending on climbing the career ladder toward success finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he is trying to prosecute.

name: Halloween
summary_text: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution and immediately returns to Haddonfield to find his baby sister, Laurie.

name: The Hours
summary_text: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

name: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
summary_text: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

name: Seventh Son
summary_text: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.

name: It Comes at Night
summary_text: Secure within a desolate home as an unnatural threat terrorizes the world, a man has established a tenuous domestic order with his wife and son. Then a desperate young family arrives seeking refuge.

name: Itaewon Class
summary_text: An ex-con opens a street bar in Itaewon, while also seeking revenge on the family who was responsible for his father's death.

name: Nerve
summary_text: A high school senior finds herself immersed in an online game of truth or dare, where her every move starts to become manipulated by an anonymous community of "watchers."

name: Locke
summary_text: Ivan Locke, a dedicated family man and successful construction manager, receives a phone call on the eve of the biggest challenge of his career that sets in motion a series of events that threaten his carefully cultivated existence.

name: The Hills: New Beginnings
summary_text: The original cast of The Hills reunite alongside their children, friends, and new faces, and follows their personal and professional lives in Los Angeles.

name: Crashing
summary_text: A comedy series following the lives of six 20- and 30-somethings living together as property guardians of a large, disused hospital.

name: Straw Dogs
summary_text: Los Angeles screenwriter David Sumner relocates with his wife to her hometown in the deep South. There, while tensions build between them, a brewing conflict with locals becomes a threat to them both.

name: This Time with Alan Partridge
summary_text: Alan is handed a career lifeline - the chance to stand in (temporarily) as co-host on This Time, a weekday magazine show. But can he capitalise on the opportunity?

name: The Luminaries
summary_text: Adventure mystery set in the midst of New Zealand's 1860's gold rush period. It has all the stuff that makes a good drama: murder, love and revenge, as men and women travel the world making their fortunes.

name: The Brady Bunch Movie
summary_text: The original 70s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

name: Cold Creek Manor
summary_text: A family relocates from the city to a dilapidated house in the country that was once a grand estate. As they begin renovations, they discover their new home harbors a secret and may not be completely free of its former inhabitant.

name: October Sky
summary_text: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

name: That Thing You Do!
summary_text: A local Pennsylvania band scores a one-hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from their manager.

name: I Spit on Your Grave 2
summary_text: When Katie innocently accepts an offer to have new photos taken for her portfolio, the experience quickly turns into a nightmare of rape, torture and kidnapping. Now, she will have to find the strength to exact her brutal revenge.

name: Ponyo
summary_text: A five-year-old boy develops a relationship with Ponyo, a young goldfish princess who longs to become a human after falling in love with him.

name: Dragon Ball
summary_text: Son Gokû, a fighter with a monkey tail, goes on a quest with an assortment of odd characters in search of the Dragon Balls, a set of crystals that can give its bearer anything they desire.

name: D3: The Mighty Ducks
summary_text: The unruly team of hockey misfits grows up a bit and receives scholarships to a prestigious prep school, where they take on the snotty varsity team.

name: Family Reunion
summary_text: When the McKellan family moves from Seattle to Georgia to be closer to extended family, the transition is like being a catfish out of water.

name: Looking
summary_text: The experiences of three close friends living and loving in modern-day San Francisco.

name: Animal Kingdom
summary_text: A seventeen-year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

name: Scary Movie V
summary_text: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.

name: Beauty Shop
summary_text: A determined hairstylist (Queen Latifah) competes with her former boss (Kevin Bacon) after opening her own business in Atlanta.

name: Wakefield
summary_text: Nikhil Katira is a psychiatric nurse working at Wakefield, a facility perched on the edge of Australia's spectacular Blue Mountains. There's one problem - while his patients are getting better, he's getting worse.

name: The Host
summary_text: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.

name: 47 Meters Down: Uncaged
summary_text: Two sisters diving in a ruined underwater city quickly learn they've entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth of submerged caves.

name: Peppa Pig
summary_text: A little pig named Peppa and her little brother George have journeys everyday with their family and friends.

name: Jonathan Creek
summary_text: Working from his home in a converted windmill, Jonathan Creek is a magician with a natural ability for solving puzzles. He soon puts this ability to the use of solving impossible crimes and mysterious murders.

name: Second Act
summary_text: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

name: The Ridiculous 6
summary_text: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers. Together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

name: The Interview
summary_text: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Jong-Un Kim, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.

name: The Harvey Girls
summary_text: On a train trip West to become a mail-order bride, Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) meets a cheery crew of young women travelling out to open a "Harvey House" restaurant at a remote whistle-stop.

name: Open Range
summary_text: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

name: Operation Brothers
summary_text: Israel's Mossad agents attempt to rescue Ethiopian Jewish refugees in Sudan in 1979.

name: Mannix
summary_text: Mannix worked originally for Wickersham at Intertect and then struck out on his own, assisted by Peggy Fair (whose cop-husband had been killed) and Police Department contact Tobias.

name: The Secret Garden
summary_text: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.

name: Die Hart
summary_text: Kevin Hart plays a fictionalized version of himself on a quest to land the action-movie role of a lifetime.

name: Just Friends
summary_text: While visiting his hometown during Christmas, a man comes face-to-face with his old high school crush whom he was best friends with -- a woman whose rejection of him turned him into a ferocious womanizer.

name: Zoolander 2
summary_text: Derek and Hansel are lured into modelling again, in Rome, where they find themselves the target of a sinister conspiracy.

name: The Land Before Time
summary_text: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

name: After Hours
summary_text: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho who he met that evening at a coffee shop.

name: The Bonfire of the Vanities
summary_text: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight and attracting the interest of a down and out reporter.

name: The Pink Panther
summary_text: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".

name: Self/less
summary_text: A dying real estate mogul transfers his consciousness into a healthy young body, but soon finds that neither the procedure nor the company that performed it are quite what they seem.

name: Transcendence
summary_text: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence takes on dangerous implications when his own consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

name: Escape at Dannemora
summary_text: A female prison employee, Tilly (Patricia Arquette) in upstate New York becomes romantically involved with a pair of inmates and helps them escape.

name: Breaking Boundaries: The Science of Our Planet
summary_text: David Attenborough and scientist Johan Rockström examine Earth's biodiversity collapse and how this crisis can still be averted.

name: Never Say Never Again
summary_text: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

name: Years and Years
summary_text: As Britain slowly turns into a dictatorship throughout the years, the lives of a typical busy family from Manchester converge on one crucial night in 2019.

name: The Zookeeper's Wife
summary_text: Keepers of the Warsaw Zoo, Antonina and Jan Zabinski, must save hundreds of people and animals during the Nazi invasion in WWII Poland.

name: Unfriended
summary_text: A group of online chat room friends find themselves haunted by a mysterious, supernatural force using the account of their dead friend.

name: Forever
summary_text: A 200-year-old man works in the New York City Morgue trying to find a key to unlock the curse of his immortality.

name: Criminal Justice
summary_text: Sex, drugs and a gruesome murder. An edgy one night stand turns into a nightmare for Aditya, when he wakes up with blood on his hands. The evidence is stacked against him, but he doesn't remember the grisly crime. Is he guilty or not ?

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
summary_text: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

name: Parasyte: The Maxim
summary_text: 17-year-old Shinichi Izumi is partially infected by a Parasyte; monsters that butcher and consume humans. He must learn to co-exist with the creature if he is to survive both the life of a Parasyte and human, as part monster, part person.

name: Kramer vs. Kramer
summary_text: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

name: Andhadhun
summary_text: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

name: The Omen
summary_text: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

name: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
summary_text: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

name: Undone
summary_text: A woman discovers she has a new relationship with time after surviving a car accident that almost killed her.

name: Wrong Turn 2: Dead End
summary_text: A group of reality show contestants find themselves fighting for their survival against a family of hideously deformed inbred cannibals who plan to ruthlessly butcher them all.

name: The First Time
summary_text: A shy senior and a down-to-earth junior fall in love over one weekend.
